General.Name: Zhejiang Huazheng New Material
General.Description: Zhejiang Wazam New Materials Co.,LTD. engages in the design, development, production, and sale of copper clad laminates and adhesive sheets, composite materials, and membrane materials. Its products are used in in communication information exchange systems, cloud computing storage systems, automatic driving signal acquisition systems, Internet of things radio frequency systems, 5G communications, servers, data centers, semiconductor packaging, new energy vehicles, smart home appliances, medical equipment, rail transportation, green logistics, and other fields. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Hong Sheng  Liu
2.Title: Deputy GM & GM of the Functional Composite Materials Division
